thx Misty for the heads up
See ya in the chat !!!!!!
deb

_________________=
_______________

From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.=
com] On Behalf
Of Misty Dawn
Sent: Friday, September 18, 2009 7:40 AM
To: E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] 3 DAY LIVE EVENT - starts today S=
ept 18th Keith Age,
Dave and Tom Jones and many more


  

Ok guys I said I=
 would try and give you guys a heads up since many of
you enjoyed the past =
live events on PTN so here ya go. Paranormal
Television Network is broadcas=
ting another live event this weekend
September 18th - 20th. 
 
www.paranorm=
altvnetwork.com <http://www.paranormaltvnetwork.com> 
or
www.paranormaltele=
visionnetwork.com
<http://www.paranormaltelevisionnetwork.com/> 
 
It will =
be free to watch and participate in the interactive chat. For
more info you=
 can check out www.octagonhall.com
<http://www.octagonhall.com> . Afternoon=
 activities include many guest
speakers on a variety of subjects, re-enacto=
rs, living history demo's,
live cannon fire, raffles, contests, and music a=
long with other
activities. And yes they will be having a ghosthunt at nigh=
t there as
well for those who are interested in the paranormal side of the
=
location. 
 
Guest speakers at the Octagon Hall commemoration will include =
Bryan
Bush, Dr. Ron Hatcher, Dr. Michael Trapasso, Paul Browning, Keith Age=
,
Chris Dedman, and Rhiannon Waits. Paul Browning has written a book
entitl=
ed Hauntings at Octagon Hall. Dave and Tom Jones Para-X Radio CBS
Psychicon=
air Clarksville Ghost Hunters and a few surprise guests.
 
GHOST HUNTERS WI=
LL ENCOUNTER
CIVIL WAR RE-ENACTORS SEPT. 18-20
AS OCTAGON HALL MARKS 150 YE=
ARS

Franklin, Ky. -- Octagon Hall, an eight-sided brick antebellum home in=

Franklin, Ky., is observing the 150th anniversary of its completion. A
thr=
ee-day celebration Sept. 18, 19, and 20 will feature Civil War
re-enactors =
and historians alongside paranormal investigators and ghost
hunters. 
 
 Oc=
tagon
Hall<http://i189.photobucket.com/albums/z226/cdproductions/webflyerOc=
tag
onHall.jpg> 
 
Looks like another fun weekend event fundraiser to help =
with restoration
of a historic landmark. If you cant make it out to the loc=
ation then
come join in watching it LIVE for free.
 
Have a great day!
Mist=
y
